verbose_text: Some studies have shown that the induction of HO-1 promotes cellular protection against oxidative injury through different mechanisms, such as by controlling intracellular levels of free heme (an anti-oxidant), producing biliverdin (an anti-oxidant), improving perfusion of nutrients via the release of CO, and inducing ferritin synthesis through the release of free iron XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
